title: Drawing, "Front Elevation, J. Pierpont Morgan Library, New York", 1900
medium: Graphite and colored pencil on white tracing paper
signed: Lower right in graphite: Warren Wetmore Architects
inscribed: in graphite, lower left: For J.P. Morgan. Esq.; lower center: Front/ sketch for Library - MUSEUM; lower right: Warren Wetmore Architects; 3 East 33 [---] - N.Y.C.; signed in graphite, lower right: WW. [---]
description:
Front view of the elevation of a domed building with four columns flanking a central doorway. 
Scale: in graphite, lower right.

exhibitions.title: The Cooper-Hewitt Collections: A Design Resource

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Front Elevation, J. Pierpont Morgan Library, New York", 1900.
1900. Graphite and colored pencil on white tracing paper. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-401.
